message.content:
cs.SY, cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.MA, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with wireless networked control systems, which are typically studied in the systems and control (cs.SY) sub-category. The paper also discusses power allocation and channel conditions, which are topics covered in the information theory (cs.IT) sub-category. The use of wireless communication in the context of industrial IoT suggests that the paper may also belong to the networking and internet architecture (cs.NI) sub-category. The optimization problem formulation and solution may also place the paper in the mathematical optimization (cs.MA) sub-category. Finally, the comparison of the proposed method with conventional methods may involve machine learning (cs.LG) techniques.
